content: @beanieboatdesigns follow me @beanieboatdesigns on instagram and facebook for updates on future patterns test-knits and giveaways from the boat yes i said boat … it s on a narrowboat where i live and work > if you like the look of this pattern > it would be a huge help to me if you > would give it a like here on ravelry as i have an > overflowing notebook of ideas and this > helps me understand what to work on > next your support of my little dream > is so appreciated every like helps > and it s a known fact i do a tiny > happy dance each time i get a > notification i am a terrible dancer
